name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - paracetamol and tramadol combination
title: Paracetamol and tramadol combination cost per 1000 patients
description: Cost of paracetamol and tramadol combination per 1000 patients
openc_numerator_name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - paracetamol and tramadol combination
why_it_matters: Prescribing the combination product of paracetamol and tramadol costs more than prescribing the preparations separately.
The doses are also different (32.5mg of tramadol, 325mg of paracetamol) than those generally used (50mg tramadol, 500mg paracetamol).
